description.p: This book provides all of the setting, story, and character options needed for adventures in the Great Dale.

The Great Dale is a land in the Forgotten Realms found within the Unapproachable East, a long journey from the Sword Coast. It is a land filled with ancient and terrible secrets waiting to be discovered. Here, powerful druids clash with the fiendish taint left behind by an ancient empire. Opportunity and intrigue await those who join the rush of factions seeking to control the rejuvenated city of Uthmere. Above all, the Great Dale is a land of adventure.

setters.set: Joe Raso, Alex Clippinger, Anne Gregersen, Derek Nekritz, Elise Cretel, Emily Smith, Glenn Magas, Oliver Clegg, R P Davis, Scott Bean
